name: Cheesy Chicken & Green Bean Casserole
ingredients: 3 14.25-ounce cans French cut green beans, drained
1 small onion, sliced in very thin rings, 2.5 ounces
2 cups diced cooked chicken or turkey

instructions.en: Sauté celery and onion in butter until browned.
Combine beans, mushrooms, and celery/onion mixture in casserole dish.
Stir in mayonnaise, cream, and seasonings. Mix well.
Bake uncovered at 350º for 30-40 minutes, until bubbly and brown.

notes: Makes about 8 servings. Do not freeze. Can be microwaved on MEDIUM for 20-30 minutes, stirring occasionally, as an alternative cooking method.
